text: Kananjalo zonke izinto ezisemazulwini nasemhlabeni zezika- All창h.Yaye Sacebisa aBantu beNcwadi ngaphambili kunani, nakuni maMuslim (Sithi): yoyikani uAll창h nigcine uxanduva lwenu kuYe, kodwa ukuba anikholwa, (yazini okokuba) zonke izinto ezisemazulwini nasemhlabeni zezika-All창h, kwaye uAll창h Wahlala esisiTyebi, Ufanelwe ziindumiso zonke
